column5: We were up at  friends cottage for the weekend and I decided to bring the fishing gear to try my luck. I tried top water, carolina rigs and boat dock flipping and nothing worked. Finally I came across the huge boathouse and decided to toss the lizard in there and thank God I did. Here is the result. I went back to the spot three more time that weekend and lost 2 more big fish. That was the only spot on the lake where I had success. I found it very odd actually. Many of the locals were saying that the pike infestation has been devouring the largemouth population and the only ones that can survive are the larger ones.
very nice.. how big was it? im guessing atleast 4lbs
Hey,  The fish was around 4.5lbs and the guy in the backround is about 300lbs! LOL. (my brother in-law)
